name: 异星夺宝
description:
This is a game that uses shooting to solve puzzles!

You're a graduate student in interstellar Archaeology, and for your summer internship this year, you're flying solo to exotic alien ruins in search of hidden treasures!

It's full of invisible deadly traps. Shoot to find your way to the treasure!

Enter the strange alien underground relics, where there are all kinds of strange organs, all kinds of danger, of course, there are also valuable treasure!

Plan your shooting plan carefully, and use your only bullets to find the key to the ultimate treasure door!

Movement: W A S D
Shooting: click the mouse
